Title: Salon Kitty
Writer: Antonio Colantuoni (story), Ennio De Concini (story), Maria Pia Fusco (story), Ennio De Concini (screenplay), Maria Pia Fusco (screenplay), Tinto Brass (screenplay)
Actors: Helmut Berger, Ingrid Thulin, Teresa Ann Savoy, John Steiner
Plot: Kitty runs a brothel in Nazi Germany where the soldiers come to "relax". Recording devices have been installed in each room by a power hungry army official, who plans to use the information to blackmail Hitler and gain power himself.
